channel.title: [pi] Npc Drops [pi]
channel.description:
Ok so iv been adding things to my pi server and added td, so here my problum i want it to drop ashes 100% hes my drop rate i made and its currently droping nothing
What i have [code]#torm demon 8349:70 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 995:20000 14484:1[/code]
what i tryed for 100% ashes [code]#torm demon 8349:70 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 995:20000 14484:1 #torm demon 8349:1 592:1 [/code]
